interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: TCM Greatest Classic Films Collection: Comedy (Arsenic and Old Lace / A Night at the Opera / The Long Long Trailer / Father of the Bride 1950)
Review Date: 2012/03/11
Store: Cary Grant  (Actor),     Marx Brothers  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Today's Deals, Spotlight Deals, Mother's Day Gift Ideas in Movies & TV
Product Description: ['TCM Greatest Classic Films: Comedy (4FE) (DVD)', 'ARSENIC AND OLD LACE Cary Grant and a stellar cast romp through this classic farce based on the Broadway hit and breezily directed by Frank Capra. A frazzled drama critic’s two maiden aunts put a secret ingredient in their elderberry wine – and the resulting circus is howlingly hilarious, with a comically rubber-faced, rubber-legged Grant in the center ring. A NIGHT AT THE OPERA Grand opera equals grand comedy as the Marx Brothers cram a ship’s stateroom and more with wall-to-wall gags, one-liners, musical riffs and two hard-boiled eggs – all while skewering pompous schemes to sabotage an opera production. “Arguably their finest film” (4 Star Rating! - Leonard Maltin’s Movie Guide). THE LONG, LONG TRAILER Anyone know how to park this thing? Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz play newlyweds who hit the honeymoon road with a 40-foot house trailer in tow in this slaphappily-ever-after comedy directed by Vincente Minnelli. FATHER OF THE BRIDE (1950) Spencer Tracy is the father and Elizabeth Taylor the bride in this comic celebration of an American rite (and wrongs) of passage. Here comes the bride, there goes dad’s wallet…and everyone’s heart. What sparkling fun!', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Classics, Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, Black & White, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Spencer Tracy, Marx Brothers, Cary Grant, Desi Arnaz, Elizabeth Taylor, Lucille Ball', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 1.0), Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1)', 'Runtime': '6 hours and 46 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '400649', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, Black & White, Subtitled, NTSC', 'Run time': '6 hours and 46 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 3, 2009', 'Actors': 'Cary Grant, Marx Brothers, Lucille Ball, Desi Arnaz, Spencer Tracy', 'Subtitles': 'English, French', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Number of discs': '4'}
Review Text: Arsenic & Old Lace is a must for any collection and the other three are definitely worth watching, too.  I admit I wouldn't have spent money on the Marx Brothers or Lucille Ball alone, but now that I have them, I'll watch.  Elizabeth Taylor is great in the original Father of the Bride.  Arsenic & Old Lace, though....  you gotta watch it.
Review Title: Great value!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Lost in Space
Stephen Hopkins  (Director),     William Hurt  (Actor),     Mimi Rogers  (Actor)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Science Fiction, Monsters & Mutants
['Product Description', 'Lost in Space (DVD)', 'A family of space colonists, their pilot and a diabolical stowaway scientist become hopelessly lost beyond the galaxy when their mission is sabotaged. Marooned in an unknown and hostile region of the cosmos, they must band together to survive in this state-of-the art update of the classic television series.', ']]>', 'Amazon.com', "Packed with more than 750 dazzling visual effects, this $70 million adventure does more (and less) than give the 1965-68 TV series a state-of-the-art face-lift. Aimed at an audience that wasn't born when the series originally aired, the sci-fi extravaganza doesn't even require familiarity, despite cameo appearances by several of the TV show's original cast members. Instead it's a high-tech hybrid of the original premise with enough sensory overload to qualify as a spectacular big-screen video game, supported by a time-travel premise that's adequately clever but hardly original. It's certainly never boring, and visually it's an occasionally awesome demonstration of special effects technology. But in its attempt to be all things to all demographics, the movie's more of a marketing ploy than a satisfying adventure, thankfully dispensing with the TV show's cheesy camp but otherwise squandering a promising cast in favor of eye-candy and ephemeral storytelling. In keeping with the movie's high-tech appeal, the DVD is a feature-packed marvel, including two audio commentaries, deleted scenes, two featurettes covering special effects and the original TV series (featuring complete biographies and episode guides), the original screenplay, and interactive games.", '--Jeff Shannon']

Arrived quickly.  I had a small problem getting it to play in one computer's drive, but it plays fine in a regular DVD player.  Probably the computer had a glitch.  Item was as described and arrived quickly.
Excellent movie.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Media Preferences:** The user enjoys science fiction and fantasy films, particularly those featuring space exploration, adventure, and high visual effects. They also have an appreciation for classic comedies, suggesting a well-rounded taste in film genres.

- **Engagement with Content:** Shows appreciation for both modern adaptations and classic films, indicating a preference for visually stimulating narratives as well as comedic elements that provide nostalgia and enjoyment.

- **Viewing Habits:** Likely to watch films with a focus on entertainment value rather than deep storytelling; appreciates action, adventure, and humor while maintaining a critical perspective on how well movies balance spectacle and narrative depth.

- **Format & Convenience:** Prefers physical media formats, specifically DVDs, and values accuracy in product descriptions and prompt delivery. Minor technical issues do not significantly deter satisfaction if resolved easily.

- **Analytical Approach:** Provides thoughtful reviews that consider performance, direction, and aesthetic value, often scoring films positively, indicating a blend of enjoyment and critical analysis.

- **Satisfaction Level:** Exhibits a high level of satisfaction with purchases, as indicated by positive ratings, even when hesitant about certain genres or titles initially. Recently expressed enjoyment of classic films, highlighting a developing interest in comedy that complements existing preferences.
